title: Cardano Smart Voting
description: It's becoming harder to vote on the many proposals. Let's provide an easy mechanism for users to vote quickly based on their interests.
solution: Let's define a common set of 3-6 "descriptors" for every proposal. Voters only need to answer 3-6 questions to get a personal voting list.
experience: I worked in a number of jobs and industries, that require to cut through complexity and deliver tangible solutions. https://bit.ly/2W2mO9D
